column1: Barker Character, Comic and Cartoon Museum
column5: In this two-storied building, you can indulge in the amazing history of toys and cartoons. The grounds are covered in unique cartoon decorations from all genres and eras. The museum also hosts a scavenger hunt for kids. It’s certainly a visit that kids would enjoy and guaranteed to take any adult down memory lane.Inside, there is also an art gallery with gorgeous prints available.
column6: A museum dedicated to antique toys, collectibles, and nostalgia.
column8: 1188 Highland Ave Building B Cheshire, Connecticut, 06410 United States
